item.title: For Loop in C
item.author: Author
item.description: Objective In this challenge, you will learn the usage of the for loop, which is a programming language statement which allows code to be executed until a terminal condition is met. They can even repeat forever if the terminal condition is never met. The syntax for the for loop is: 1 2 for ( <expression_1> ; <expression_2> ; <expression_3> ) <statement> expression_1 is used for intializing variables which are generally used for controlling the terminating flag for the loop.
